next_jobs.title: Map Global News and Finance APIs
next_jobs.instructions: List and evaluate APIs for global news and finance data, focusing on arbitrage and intelligence use.

next_jobs.instructions: Define requirements, input/output, and architecture for cross-market arbitrage signal generation.

next_jobs.instructions: Build and test a minimal news alerting engine using at least one global news source.

next_jobs.title: Detail Revenue Tracking and Analytics
next_jobs.instructions: Specify how to log, track, and report revenue for each engine in the repo.

next_jobs.title: Review Data Source Compliance
next_jobs.instructions: Check licensing, TOS, and compliance for each planned data source/API.
